channel.title: I need help making my PK area called PKBOX loose no items on death
channel.description:
I Have a place called PKBOX, which a lot of servers have. But, I want the kiddies to keep their crap when they die. Any Help??
-won[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2009, 03:27:25 pm[/size][hr]Rawr[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2009, 03:30:14 pm[/size][hr]Still waiting![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2009, 04:00:10 pm[/size][hr]rARRR
